text: manusyann avanre mumpiluteyum pinniluteyum tutarettutare vann keant allahuvinre kalpanaprakaram avane kattusuksicc keantirikkunnavar (malakkukal) untâ€Œ. etearu janatayum tannalute svantam nilapatukalil marram varuttunnat vare allahu avarute sthitikk vyatyasam varuttukayilla; tircca. oru janataykk valla deasavum varuttan allahu uddesiccal at tattimarranavilla. avannu purame avarkk yatearu raksadhikariyumilla
